desc: Specialized in film replicas, Cinereplicas is committed to offering the highest quality merchandise to all dedicated fans. Operating under official Warner Bros and Walt Disney Company licences, we offer a wide range of products from clothing, stationery and kitchenware, to collectibles or authentic life-size replicas.

layout.text: Mysterious thing, time. Powerful, and when meddled with, dangerous.
Delicately engraved with the inscription, this Time Turner is an authentic replica of the one worn by Hermione Granger.
